title: GMC publishes updated Good Medical Practice guidance
annotation: Core ethical guidance for UK doctors updated with new expectations on remote consultations and AI-assisted decision making.

title: CMA publishes Digital Markets Competition Regime guidance
annotation: Sets out how CMA will designate firms with Strategic Market Status and apply conduct requirements.

title: Anthropic releases Claude Opus 4.5 model
annotation: Latest frontier model with improved reasoning, agentic capabilities, and extended thinking.
